Shrink factors toward 1 and clip bounds

dot-shrinkClip.Rd

Shrink factors toward 1 and clip bounds

Usage

.shrinkClip(
  size_factor,
  shrink_lambda = 0,
  min_factor = 1e-06,
  max_factor = 1e+06
)

Arguments

size_factor

from .expressionFactor.

shrink_lambda

see description in DiffModification.

min_factor

minimum factor to clip, default: 1e-6.

max_factor

maximum factor to clip, default: 1e6.

Value

shrunk expression factors

On this page
